tips: The Blackboard accepts more than just dyes. Try Apricorns, Mints, Ingots... Chocolate?
A Copper Stick is quite the formidable tool for such a cheap price. Satisfactory.
Do you have a Charting Map yet? It's time to make a path...
Look up "Mod presets" to toggle a few mods you HATE.
Many bird Pok√©mon can be brushed for their feathers.
In the Inventory, click on the top-right icon on the character to open the Accessories menu. You can hide your armor in here!
The colored hearts roughly represent your Food Diversity. The richer your diet is, the greater its benefits. So, try cooking something new.
Higher Food Diversity means you'll go hungry less often!
Loads of slabs and stairs are no more clutter. Press TAB to bring up the Shape Selector.
Transgender people can double jump. It's got to be either the testosterone, the gaming mouse, or both.
Sneaking helps picking up items above and below you. Useful when building perilously!
Intoxication makes the player unable to gain Saturation from food.
They say that alcohol makes the pain go away, but it really just delays it until you're no longer Tipsy...
Food can be safely stored in a Lunch Bag, or a Lunch Basket!
